Articles.Content:
Nyoom (Cruiser? IDK)

http://i.imgur.com/zbUQOIt.jpg

Pretty.

Also;

BATTLE UPDATE!:

Following the brazen attack on the Dr. StrangeKerb, the A.D.A. retaliates, quickly attacking the HMS Tanzwut.

Trying to hit it from multiple angles to find a weak spot, the MU crew manage to dish out some moderate damage, with the most obvious being the large rectangular hole in the ship's side.

Despite the A.D.A.'s crew wishing to continue their bombardment of the Tanzwut, MU FLEETCOM then ordered the undamaged pocket destroyer to regroup with its injured cousin in ultra-low orbit above Vall.

Your move Zekes, though I will say that your Dreks are tough; but they are now proven to be not 100% invuln. Better fix that side-paneling.

DL:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/xk9xk9tyvqjwq9l/persistent9001.sfs?dl=0

EDIT:

The reason the top tower looks detached in the first pic is due to some uber-lag that kept making the parts shift during large explosions.

Pretty.

Also;

BATTLE UPDATE!:

Following the brazen attack on the Dr. StrangeKerb, the A.D.A. retaliates, quickly attacking the HMS Tanzwut.

http://i.imgur.com/71sPGwB.png

Trying to hit it from multiple angles to find a weak spot, the MU crew manage to dish out some moderate damage, with the most obvious being the large rectangular hole in the ship's side.

http://i.imgur.com/F1upE9K.png

Despite the A.D.A.'s crew wishing to continue their bombardment of the Tanzwut, MU FLEETCOM then ordered the undamaged pocket destroyer to regroup with its injured cousin in ultra-low orbit above Vall.

http://i.imgur.com/Q1w0706.png

http://i.imgur.com/adY4ycQ.png

Your move Zekes, though I will say that your Dreks are tough; but they are now proven to be not 100% invuln. Better fix that side-paneling.

DL:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/xk9xk9tyvqjwq9l/persistent9001.sfs?dl=0

EDIT:

The reason the top tower looks detached in the first pic is due to some uber-lag that kept making the parts shift during large explosions.

That side armor did exactly what it was designed to do... an XIV would have probably lost most its fuel in a hit like that, instead the XXVII just lost one tank. Also keep in mind the XXVII is 100% new armor; it's the first non-XIV armor design to actually work, and I'm quite impressed with it's results.

BATTLE UPDATE!

Tanzwut was not impressed by the A.D.A's attack. She wanted blood. She found it in the form of the Parangosky. Allowance was 3 missiles for this target; it was expected to be heavily armored. The first missile tore off the portside engine assembly and armor.

The second one completely dissected the ship (im not kidding, it was awesome); both crew sections somehow survived and floated off unharmed.

Tanzwut did not fire her third allowed missile. She simply ejected the spent decoupler and drifted away from the wreck.

PERSIST: https://www./?syibozab81qsjl5

Edited October 17, 2014 by zekes

Ok, so I'm interested in joining the fun, Is there a way I can download some of the weapons used?

I have no idea what I'm doing when it comes to weapons.

If your computer can handle it, then Here's a new version of my 'Victory' class (For those who are familiar with the old version, this one has better heavy missiles (they also suit the ships aesthetics better) and some stronger armour protecting the vital areas) which is made of 525 parts and must be hyperedited to orbit.

But none-the-less she's a powerful ship.

Download

I got to here

and KSP freaked the **** out again.

*SIGH*

Back to square 1 I suppose
I had the same problem building the Britannic, regular saving seems to fix it.

That side armor did exactly what it was designed to do... an XIV would have probably lost most its fuel in a hit like that, instead the XXVII just lost one tank. Also keep in mind the XXVII is 100% new armor; it's the first non-XIV armor design to actually work, and I'm quite impressed with it's results.

BATTLE UPDATE!

Tanzwut was not impressed by the A.D.A's attack. She wanted blood. She found it in the form of the Parangosky. Allowance was 3 missiles for this target; it was expected to be heavily armored. The first missile tore off the portside engine assembly and armor.

http://i.imgur.com/6On2pZY.png

The second one completely dissected the ship (im not kidding, it was awesome); both crew sections somehow survived and floated off unharmed.

http://i.imgur.com/jigrSOG.jpg

Tanzwut did not fire her third allowed missile. She simply ejected the spent decoupler and drifted away from the wreck.

http://i.imgur.com/fmDmsgI.png

PERSIST: https://www./?syibozab81qsjl5
